sentences.sentence: Instead of the occasional blink, Arabs lowered their lids so slowly and languorously that she was convinced they were falling asleep.
sentences.translation: 阿拉伯人没有偶尔眨眼，而是慢慢地、懒洋洋地垂下眼睑，她确信他们已经睡着了。

sentences.sentence: I remember that I saw that he looked languorously at Salome.
sentences.translation: 我记得，我看到过，他忧郁地看着莎乐美。
